text: Country Code: +375 International Call Prefix: 00 (was 8~10) Trunk Prefix: 8 Belarus began using its own country code +375 in 1995. Before that it was part of the +7 international country code. The local numbering plan came from USSR. It has changed little. Geographic area codes were made based on previous 3-digit USSR area codes by removing the lead 0. Calling across areas still requires dialing trunk prefix 8 and waiting for dialtone after that. Category:Telephone numbers Category:Belarus
title: Telephone numbers in Belarus
